mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( chatNo, message, userNo, regDate, regTime ) VALUES ( #{chatNo}, #{message}, #{userNo}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%H:%i:%s') )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN delYn = 'Y' THEN '삭제된 메시지' ELSE message END AS message, checkYn, userNo, DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일'), DATE_FORMAT(regTime, '%p %h:%i') FROM chat_message WHERE chatNo = #{chatNo} ORDER BY regDate DESC, regTime DESC

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT c.*, ui.nickname FROM ( SELECT ci.chatNo, cm.message, cm.regDate, cm.regTime, CASE WHEN ci.userNo = #{userNo} THEN ci.tgUserNo ELSE ci.userNo END AS userNo FROM chat_info ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT chatNo, CASE WHEN delYn='N' THEN message ELSE '삭제된 메시지' END AS message, regDate, regTime FROM chat_message WHERE (chatNo, CONCAT(regDate, regTime)) IN ( SELECT chatNo, MAX(CONCAT(regDate,regTime)) FROM chat_message GROUP BY chatNo ) ) cm ON ci.chatNo = cm.chatNo WHERE ci.userNo = #{userNo} OR ci.tgUserNo = #{userNo} ) c JOIN user_info ui ON c.userNo = ui.no ) T ORDER BY regDate DESC, regTime DESC LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{recordPage}
